20101215020539.333|20101215020541.000|CCO|>> Warner: HE WAS BORN IN NEW
20101215020541.000|20101215020543.000|CCO|YORK IN 1941 TO EUROPEAN
20101215020543.000|20101215020545.000|CCO|JEWISH PARENTS WHO HAD FLED
20101215020545.000|20101215020547.000|CCO|NAZI-ERA GERMANY.
20101215020547.000|20101215020549.000|CCO|AFTER GRADUATING FROM BROWN,
20101215020549.000|20101215020551.000|CCO|HOLBROOK JOINED THE FOREIGN
20101215020551.000|20101215020552.667|CCO|SERVICE, POSTED FIRST TO
20101215020552.667|20101215020554.333|CCO|VIETNAM AND THEN TO THE
20101215020554.333|20101215020556.000|CCO|VIETNAM POLICY TEAM IN LYNDON

20101215020557.667|20101215020559.333|CCO|FINALLY AS A JUNIOR MEMBER OF
20101215020559.333|20101215020601.000|CCO|THE U.S. DELEGATION TO THE
20101215020601.000|20101215020602.667|CCO|PARIS PEACE TALKS.
20101215020602.667|20101215020604.333|CCO|HE OFTEN SAID IT WAS THE
20101215020604.333|20101215020606.000|CCO|DEFINING EXPERIENCE OF HIS
20101215020606.000|20101215020607.667|CCO|PUBLIC LIFE.
20101215020607.667|20101215020609.333|CCO|HOLBROOK WENT ON TO SERVE IN
20101215020609.333|20101215020611.000|CCO|HIGH POSTS IN THREE DEMOCRATIC
20101215020611.000|20101215020612.667|CCO|ADMINISTRATIONS, INCLUDING
20101215020612.667|20101215020614.333|CCO|ASSISTANT SECRETARY OF STATE
20101215020614.333|20101215020616.000|CCO|FOR PRESIDENT CARTER AND
20101215020616.000|20101215020617.667|CCO|AMBASSADOR TO GERMANY,
20101215020617.667|20101215020619.333|CCO|ASSISTANT SECRETARY OF STATE
20101215020619.333|20101215020621.000|CCO|AND UNITED NATIONS AMBASSADOR
20101215020621.000|20101215020623.000|CCO|FOR PRESIDENT CLINTON.
20101215020623.000|20101215020625.000|CCO|WHETHER DEALING OVERSEAS OR IN
20101215020625.000|20101215020627.000|CCO|WASHINGTON, HOLBROOK USED HIS
20101215020627.000|20101215020629.000|CCO|INTELLECT AND HIS EGO TO BULLY,
20101215020629.000|20101215020631.000|CCO|TO CHARM, TO CAJOLE.
20101215020631.000|20101215020632.667|CCO|HIS PERSONA BORE FRUIT WHEN HE
20101215020632.667|20101215020634.333|CCO|PUSHED THREE WARRING NATIONS
20101215020634.333|20101215020636.000|CCO|TO END THE BOSNIA CONFLICT.
20101215020636.000|20101215020637.667|CCO|THE 1995 DAYTON PEACE ACCORD
20101215020637.667|20101215020639.333|CCO|WAS THE CROWNING ACHIEVEMENT
20101215020639.333|20101215020641.000|CCO|OF HIS CAREER.
20101215020641.000|20101215020643.000|CCO|THE DAY THE DEAL WAS ANNOUNCED
20101215020643.000|20101215020645.000|CCO|IN ONE OF HIS DOZENS OF
20101215020645.000|20101215020647.000|CCO|NEWSHOUR APPEARANCES OVER THE
20101215020647.000|20101215020649.000|CCO|YEARS, HOLBROOK SPOKE TO
20101215020649.000|20101215020651.000|CCO|ELIZABETH FARNSWORTH.
20101215020651.000|20101215020652.429|CCO|>> THOSE LAST FEW HOURS, THE
20101215020652.429|20101215020653.857|CCO|TOUGHEST THING YOU WERE
20101215020653.857|20101215020655.286|CCO|NEGOTIATING ABOUT AND HOW YOU
20101215020655.286|20101215020656.714|CCO|RESOLVED IT.
20101215020656.714|20101215020658.143|CCO|>> BY THE LAST FEW HOURS THE
20101215020658.143|20101215020659.571|CCO|ISSUES WERE VERY SMALL IN
20101215020659.571|20101215020701.000|CCO|RELATIONSHIP TO WHAT HAD BEEN
20101215020701.000|20101215020702.429|CCO|ACHIEVED.
20101215020702.429|20101215020703.857|CCO|99%... MORE THAN 99% WAS
20101215020703.857|20101215020705.286|CCO|FINISHED.
20101215020705.286|20101215020706.714|CCO|BUT THERE'S A QUESTION AT THE
20101215020706.714|20101215020708.143|CCO|END OF A NEGOTIATION LIKE THIS
20101215020708.143|20101215020709.571|CCO|NOT OF SUBSTANCE BUT OF
20101215020709.571|20101215020711.000|CCO|POLITICAL WILL.
20101215020711.000|20101215020712.429|CCO|YOU PICK UP THE PEN AND PUT
20101215020712.429|20101215020713.857|CCO|YOUR INITIALS ON A PIECE OF
20101215020713.857|20101215020715.286|CCO|PAPER.
20101215020715.286|20101215020716.714|CCO|OR DO YOU KEEP SEEKING MORE
20101215020716.714|20101215020718.143|CCO|AND MORE AND MORE SO YOU NEVER
20101215020718.143|20101215020719.571|CCO|GET THERE.
20101215020719.571|20101215020721.000|CCO|CAMP DAVID IN 1978, THE WAR
20101215020721.000|20101215020722.111|CCO|BETWEEN ISRAEL AND EGYPT, HAD
20101215020722.111|20101215020723.222|CCO|BEEN FIVE YEARS OLD.
20101215020723.222|20101215020724.333|CCO|IT STILL WAS DIFFICULT.
20101215020724.333|20101215020725.444|CCO|HERE WE'RE TRYING TO DO THE
20101215020725.444|20101215020726.556|CCO|SAME THING IN THE MIDDLE OF A
20101215020726.556|20101215020727.667|CCO|WAR WITH THREE COUNTRIES
20101215020727.667|20101215020728.778|CCO|INSTEAD OF TWO.
20101215020728.778|20101215020729.889|CCO|IT WAS TOUGH.
20101215020729.889|20101215020731.000|CCO|>> Warner: EVEN WHEN NOT IN
20101215020731.000|20101215020733.000|CCO|OFFICE WORKING AS AN EDITOR OR
20101215020733.000|20101215020735.000|CCO|INVESTMENT BANKER, HOLBROOK
20101215020735.000|20101215020737.000|CCO|STAYED ENGAGED IN ALL MANNER
20101215020737.000|20101215020739.000|CCO|OF GLOBAL ISSUES.
20101215020739.000|20101215020741.000|CCO|HIS OP EDS AND PUBLIC
20101215020741.000|20101215020742.667|CCO|APPEARANCES, HERE IN 1985 HE
20101215020742.667|20101215020744.333|CCO|SPOKE WITH JIM LEHRER ABOUT
20101215020744.333|20101215020746.000|CCO|VIETNAM'S DECISION TO RELEASE
20101215020746.000|20101215020747.667|CCO|THE REMAINS OF MISSING
20101215020747.667|20101215020749.333|CCO|AMERICAN SERVICEMEN.
20101215020749.333|20101215020751.000|CCO|>> THEY ARE NOW ISOLATED IN AN
20101215020751.000|20101215020753.000|CCO|INCREASINGLY PROSPEROUS
20101215020753.000|20101215020755.000|CCO|SOUTHEAST ASIA.
20101215020755.000|20101215020757.000|CCO|ALL THEY'VE GOT LEFT AMONG
20101215020757.000|20101215020759.000|CCO|VERY FEW OTHER CHIPS ARE THE
20101215020759.000|20101215020801.000|CCO|REMAINS OF SOME AMERICANS WHO
20101215020801.000|20101215020802.250|CCO|DIED IN INDO-CHINA.
20101215020802.250|20101215020803.500|CCO|WITH THE GREATEST-CYNICISM
20101215020803.500|20101215020804.750|CCO|THEY HAVE BEEN DOLING THESE
20101215020804.750|20101215020806.000|CCO|REMAINS OUT FOR YEARS.
